data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve itinerary price metrics for analysis
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves price metrics and analysis data for flight itineraries. This operation allows you to analyze pricing trends, patterns, and statistics for specific flight routes and date ranges. Accepts parameters to filter by origin, destination, departure date, and other criteria. Returns a collection of price metric objects containing pricing statistics, trends, and comparative analysis data. Use this operation to support price analysis, fare comparison, and booking decision optimization.
